column3:
Heal the target for a small amount of HP. Can also deal damage to the undead.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 20.

Use magic to summon a light source that illuminates an area around the spell caster for 3600 secs.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 10.

Form a protective shield and increase own AC by 2 points. Cannot be stacked.
Learning requirement:
Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 30.

Cast a small magic beam that deals a small amount of damage to the target. Mage class consume 0 mana upon casting under level 30; Elf and Royal class consume 0 mana upon casting under level 20. 
Learning requirement: 
Royal: Level 10 
Mage: Level 4 
Elf: Level 8 
Knight: Level 50

Teleport to a random place. Can also select a specific spot to teleport to by using \Ring of Teleportation\.

Royal:Level 10
Mage:Level 4
Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 50.

Elf: Level 8

Royal:Level 10

Elf:Level 8
Knight:Level 50.

Empower weapons to increase damage. The empowered weapon will be able to deal additional damage on the undead.

Knight:Level 40.

Use magic to cure the target and heal them from poison.

Absorb some HP from target and add it to your own. Casting this spell causes your Lawful value to decrease by 2.

Elf:Level 16.

Detect invisible monsters and players. Turn the pk mode on， to detect invisible players.

Royal: Level 20 
Mage: Level 8

Increase own load bearing capacity for a period of time

Change the environment around the enemies with wind power

This Edin spell book contains elementary magic skills. 
 Category: Skill level 4 (Common) 
 Effect: Use the power of the earth to form a huge thorn， to pierce and wrap your opponent， causing damage to the target and the enemies within 1 unit range. 
Learning Requirement: 
Mage: Level 16 
Elf: Level 32
Cast a protective magical shield around self

Enter the meditation state which grant the spellcaster a faster MP recovery. The effect will disappear once you start to move or attacking. 
 Learning requirement: 
 Mage: Level 16 
 Elf: Level 32

Summon a mummy to rise from the ground and attack your enemies， with a chance of paralyzing them. Casting this spell will reduce your Lawful value by 500. 
Learning Requirement: 
Mage: Level 20 
Elf: Level 40

Summon lightning to strike down your enemies which cause a great damage. 
Learning requirement: 
Mage: Level 20 
Elf: Level 40

Recover a great amount of HP for the target. Also deals damage on the undead.

Mage:Level 20
Elf:Level 40.

Chance to tame monsters and make them follow you. The lower the HP， the higher success rate.

Summon a puppet from your enemy， which can help the spell caster during combat. Learning Requirement: \nMage: Level 24 \nElf: Level 48

Use flames to increase target's STR by 5 points. Can only be used on Clan members. Effect does not stack.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Increase speed of target for 20 mins. Spell cannot be cast again while still active on target.
Learning requirement:
Mage:Level 24
Elf:Level 48.

Dispel enemies magic spells with the power of the wind. Has a chance to remove all buff on the target. 
Learning requirement: 
Mage: Level 24 
Elf: Level 48

Learning Requirement: 
Mage: Level 24 
Elf: Level 48

Learning Requirement: 
Mage: Level 24 
Elf: Level 48

Mage: Level 24

Mage: Level 24 
Elf: Level 48.
Heal all Clan members on the screen.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.
Deal damage on the target with the possibility of freezing them. When frozen， the target cannot be attacked and cannot move. \n Learning requirement: \n Mage: Level 28

Summon monsters which can help to assist you upon casting this spell. The number of monster summoned depends on the points of your charisma whereas your level affects the type of monsters summoned. Casting this spell will cause your Lawful value to decrease by 10. \nLearning requirement: \nMage: Level 28
Empower the spell caster's own feet to increase movement speed.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 28.
Summon a strong whirlwind， causing great damage to the target and the enemies within 2 units range. Turn Pk mode on， to cast on other players. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 28
Increase spell caster’s speed by 50% for 30 mins. Cannot be stacked. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 28

Increase close range physical attack of your team members， clan members and yourself by 5 points. However， your AC will decrease by 10 points and will not be affected by spells that can help you to regenerate faster HP. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 28

Use magic to make your enemy turn ill. Chance to reduce your enemy AC by 12 points， and accuracy rate by 6 points. Casting this spell will reduce your Lawful value by 10. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 28
Recover a huge amount of HP for the target. Can also deal damage on the undead.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Create a magical flaming wall that deals damage on all enemies that touch it.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Summon an ice storm which can cause great damage to the target and the enemies within 5 unit range. Casting this spell will reduce your Lawful value by 10. \nLearning requirement: \nMage: Level 32
Turn the spellcaster into invisible state. Will be inactive once you receive attacks from the enemy. Learning Requirement: \nMage: Level 32
Resurrect the dead target with full HP.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 32.
Trigger earthquakes， causing great damage to the target and the enemies within 1 unit range.\nLearning requirement: \nMage: Level 32
Create an energy ring that increases the HP recovery speed of all players within the area. \nLearning requirement: \nMage: Level 32
Seal your enemy with magic. Chance to make them unable to cast any spell for a period of time. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 32
Summon lightning and stormy winds to deal damage on the target and enemies within one unit distance from them.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.

Chance to make the target and enemies within one unit range to fall asleep for 32 secs. Enemies will be awakened once he received attacks. Casting this spell will reduce your Lawful value by 10. \nLearning requirement: \nMage: Level 36
Chance to temporarily change the form of the target.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.
Create a huge magical protective shield for Clan members， reducing the damage receive by half while the duration is still active. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 36

Teleport the spell caster and Clan members within one unit distance from him to a random location. May select a specific spot to teleport to when using \Ring of Teleportation\.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 36.
Cast a flaming tornado， causing damage to the target and non- blue or white colored named enemy which stand near him. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 36
Freeze all potions on the target， has a chance to cause them to be unable to use any potions during the effective period. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 36
Detect all invisible monsters and enemies on the screen， turning them visible and attack them immediately. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 36
Chance to change the spell caster’s weapon into a +1 weapon permanently. Cannot be used repeatedly on the same weapon.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
Summon falling meteors from the sky， causing great damage to the target and the enemies within 1 unit range. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 40
Resurrect the dead target with full HP as well as 25% of the EXP lost upon death.\nLearning requirement:\nMage:Level 40.
Cast an earth spell to change the topography of the land， has a chance of reducing the speed of the target and the enemies within 1 unit range. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 40
Summon a huge bayonet falling from the sky which cause fatal damage to your enemy. Casting this spell will increase your Lawful value by 1. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 40
Cast an invincible protective shield for the spell caster which block all attacks for 12 secs. It will deactivate immediately upon casting another spell. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 40
Increase target's HP and MP by 20% while activated. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 40
Summon a swirling snowstorm， causing great damage to the target and the enemies within 5 units range. Has a chance to freeze the target. \nLearning Requirement: \nMage: Level 40

Chance to stun the target for a few seconds. This skill can only be used when two-handed swords are equipped. Consume 5% total HP + 30 HP upon casting this spell \nLearning requirement: \nKnight: Level 50
Reduce the amount of damage received. The higher the level， the greater the amount reduced. \nLearning Requirement: \nKnight: Level 50
Cause magical spikes to sprout from your armor. Has a chance to break the weapons of enemies who attack you at a close range \nLearning requirement: \nKnight: Level 60
Increase own evasion rate. It only works when a shield is equipped.\nLearning requirement:\nKnight:Level 50.
Chance to reflect close range physical damage received back to the attacker. This skill can only be used when two-handed sword type weapons are equipped. \nLearning requirement: \nKnight: Level 50

Mark your opponent for 45 seconds. During the duration， the spell caster's clan member can see the mark; if the marked target is a player， it will take additional damage when attacked. \nLearning Requirement: \nRoyal: Level 15
Increase MR and accuracy rate of your team members and yourself. Effect of Shining Aura will be remove upon casting this spell. \nLearning requirement: \nRoyal: Level 40
Increase AC of your team members， clan members and yourself by 8 points. Effect of Glowing Aura will be remove upon casting this spell. \nLearning requirement: \nRoyal: Level 55
Summon members from the same Clan to your current position.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 30.
Increase physical damage of your team members and yourself by 5 points. \nLearning requirement: \nRoyal: Level 50
Teleport yourself to a specific member from the same Clan.\nLearning requirement:\nRoyal:Level 45.
Increase the spell caster’s MR by 10%.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 10.
Convert 8 points of your own HP into 2 points of MP.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 10.
The spellcaster can be immediately teleported to the World tree in Elven Garden except in areas where teleport is prohibited. \n Learning Requirement: \nElf: Level 10
Launch 3 arrows all at once
Launch 3 arrows all at once to your enemy. You need to equip a bow in order to cast this spell. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Grant the spell caster chance to reflect magic attacks for a period of time while this spell is being activated. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Increase the spell caster's Wisdom by 3 points. Cannot be stacked.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 20.
Increase all elemental resistance by 10% \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 20
Chance to release monsters which were summoned or tamed. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Convert 45 own HP into 12 MP. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Increase all elemental resistance by 50%. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Increase target's close range physical damage by 4 points
Increase target's long range accuracy rate by 6 points. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Increase the spell caster's movement speed while activated. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Increase target’s AC by 6 points. Does not stack.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 30.
Chance to lower target's movement speed， along with disabling Haste effect for 15 secs. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Has a chance to decrease target's MR by 75%. Target's MR will recover after being hit with magic attack. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 40
Summon an elf with the same attributes as the spellcaster's. \n Learning requirement: \n Elf : Level 40
Increase physical damage of your team members and yourself by 4 points. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 40
Increase long range accuracy of your team members and yourself by 2 points and long range damage by 3 points. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 40
Chance to make opponent unable to attack any target for 6 secs.\n Learning requirement: \n Elf: Level 40
Increase target's HP recovery rate. The higher the level， the higher the amound of HP recovered， can increase upto 15 HP.  Learning requirement: \n Elf: Level 40
Increase AC of your team members and yourself by 7 points. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 40
Protect target with water elements， increase target evasion by 5 points. Learning requirement: \n Elf: Level 40
Has a chance to disable magic use for all players and NPCs on screen for 16 secs.\nLearning requirement:\nElf:Level 50.
Summon a powerful elf with the same elements as the spell caster's. \n Learning requirement: \n Elf: Level 50
Increase spell caster’s close range physical damage by 6 points. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Recover a certain amount of HP for your team members. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Resurrect the dead target with full HP， MP becomes 0. \nLearning requirement: \nMage: Level 50
Increase long range damage by 5 points， however your long range accuracy will be reduce by 1 point. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Chance to decrease the enemy's attack speed for a period of time. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Increase the spell caster's AC by 10 points while activated. \nLearning Requirement:\nElf: Level 50
Allows spell caster to recover HP and MP even when overweight. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Doubling the effect of the first healing of your target while activated. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 30
Grant the spell caster 33% chance of increasing own physical ATK by 150% while activated. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Increase evasion rate from close range physical attack by 50% for 5 secs. If the spellcaster is in Haste state 2， the evasion rate will increase by 100%. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Grant the spell caster chance to reduce target's healing effect by 50% for a period of time. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Grant the spell caster chance to cause the target to be completely unable to evade long range attacks while activated. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Grant the spell caster 60% chance of increasing 50% upto 100% weapon damage while performing physical attack upon activating this spell. \nLearning Requirement: \nElf: Level 50
Allows spell caster to recover HP and MP even when overweight. \nLearning requirement: \nElf: Level 50
